wedding_section.invitation_paragraph: We are super excited to invite you to our special day!
wedding_section.where_paragraph:
Fazenda, Tartoko village 5, Kaišiadoriai district,
Kaunas county, Lithuania

getting_there_section.transportation_paragraph:
We will organise transportation to and from Fazenda venue. You don't need to worry about driving.
 Pick-up details will be added later.

If you wish to travel by yourselves, please check out the view map button below.
getting_there_section.accomodations_paragraph: We will not be staying overnight, but we will have a bus ready to pick everyone up at midnight.

faq_section.dress_code_paragraph:
Coctail attire.
We will spend some of the time outdoors, please don't forget a warmer layer clothing and shoes suitable for the grass.
faq_section.kids_paragraph:
To give all our guests the opportunity to celebrate without having to worry about little eyes and ears 
we politely request no children.
faq_section.gifts_paragraph: Best gifts can be wrapped in an envelope.
faq_section.flowers_paragraph: Let's leave the flowers to bloom in the meadows.
faq_section.anything_else_paragraph: Don't hesitate to contact us directly. :)

invitation.title:
Please join us
to our wedding ceremony
invitation.address:
Fazenda, Tartoko village 5, Kaišiadoriai district,
Kaunas county, Lithuania
16:00
